name: Vincom Center Dong Khoi
description: Luxury mall in the heart of District 1, featuring many international brands.
address: 72 Le Thanh Ton, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC
review_1: "Best Zara and H&M stores in town."

name: Van Hanh Mall
description: Largest mall in District 10, unique dome architecture, great for families.
address: 11 Su Van Hanh, Ward 12, District 10, HCMC

name: Takashimaya (Saigon Centre)
description: Japanese standard, luxury shopping, high-end fashion, and excellent food court.
address: 65 Le Loi, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC
review_1: "The sushi at the basement is top tier."

name: Landmark 81 Vincom Center
description: Located in Vietnam's tallest building, features an observation deck and ice rink.
address: 720A Dien Bien Phu, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, HCMC
review_1: "The view from the observatory is epic."

name: Crescent Mall
description: Spacious, international standard, located next to the Crescent Lake.
address: 101 Ton Dat Tien, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, HCMC

name: AEON Mall Tan Phu Celadon
description: First Japanese AEON mall in HCMC, huge parking, very crowded on weekends.
address: 30 Bo Bao Tan Thang, Son Ky Ward, Tan Phu District, HCMC

name: AEON Mall Binh Tan
description: Large mall in the West, integrated with supermarket, cinema, and entertainment.
address: 1 Street 17A, Binh Tri Dong B Ward, Binh Tan District, HCMC

name: SC VivoCity
description: Singaporean style, features a rooftop park and many family amenities.
address: 1058 Nguyen Van Linh, Distrete 7, HCMC

name: Diamond Plaza
description: Historic premium mall, prime location opposite Notre Dame Cathedral.
address: 34 Le Duan, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC
review_3: "A bit small compared to new malls."

name: Gigamall Thu Duc
description: High-tech entertainment complex, famous for JP World and dining options.
address: 242 Pham Van Dong, Hiep Binh Chanh Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC

name: Estella Place
description: Boutique mall in District 2, eco-friendly green design, premium lifestyle.
address: 161 Hanoi Highway, Thao Dien Ward, District 2 (Thu Duc City), HCMC

name: Vincom Mega Mall Thao Dien
description: Large scale mall in Thao Dien area, features an ice rink and large cinema.
address: 161 Vo Nguyen Giap, Thao Dien, Thu Duc, HCMC

name: Thiso Mall Sala
description: New mall in Sala urban area, features Emart hypermarket, modern design.
address: 10 Mai Chi Tho, Thu Thiem Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC

name: Hung Vuong Plaza
description: Recently renovated (formerly Parkson), bustling hub in District 5.
address: 126 Hong Bang, Ward 12, District 5, HCMC

name: Nowzone Fashion Mall
description: Focused on young fashion and cosmetics, bordering Districts 1, 3, and 5.
address: 235 Nguyen Van Cu, Nguyen Cu Trinh Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Lotte Mart District 7
description: Hybrid supermarket and mall model, very popular with Korean tourists.
address: 469 Nguyen Huu Tho, Tan Hung Ward, District 7, HCMC

name: Vincom Plaza Go Vap
description: Serves the densely populated Go Vap area, located at a busy intersection.
address: 12 Phan Van Tri, Ward 7, Go Vap District, HCMC

name: Menas Mall Saigon Airport
description: Located right at the Tan Son Nhat airport gateway, convenient for travelers.
address: 60A Truong Son, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, HCMC

name: Union Square
description: Ultra-luxury mall opposite City Hall, classical French architecture.
address: 171 Dong Khoi, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Bitexco Financial Tower (Icon68)
description: Compact mall inside the lotus tower, mainly cafes and cinema.
address: 2 Hai Trieu, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Pearl Plaza
description: Busy complex in Binh Thanh District with a supermarket, gym, and cinema.
address: 561A Dien Bien Phu, Ward 25, Binh Thanh District, HCMC

name: The Garden Mall
description: Formerly Thuan Kieu Plaza, revitalized with a lantern theme and Asian dining.
address: 190 Hong Bang, Ward 12, District 5, HCMC

name: Ben Thanh Market
description: Iconic symbol of Saigon, essential for souvenirs, handicrafts, and local fabric.
address: Le Loi Street, Ben Thanh Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Saigon Square
description: Famous "fashion market" plaza, popular for haggling and export surplus clothes.
address: 77-89 Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Sense Market (Central Market)
description: Underground shopping area beneath 23/9 Park, combines street food and fashion.
address: 4 Pham Ngu Lao, Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Emart Go Vap
description: Massive Korean hypermarket, very trendy for youth photography and food.
address: 366 Phan Van Tri, Ward 5, Go Vap District, HCMC

name: Emart Phan Huy Ich
description: The second Emart in HCMC, huge floor space, newly opened in Tan Binh area.
address: 385 Phan Huy Ich, Ward 14, Go Vap District, HCMC

name: Vincom Plaza 3/2
description: Compact mall in District 10, anchored by VinMart and a cinema.
address: 3C Ba Thang Hai, Ward 11, District 10, HCMC

name: Vincom Plaza Cong Hoa
description: Convenient shopping spot in Tan Binh District near the airport area.
address: 15-17 Cong Hoa, Ward 4, Tan Binh District, HCMC

name: Vincom Plaza Thu Duc
description: Central hub for Thu Duc City area, traditional mall layout with many amenities.
address: 216 Vo Van Ngan, Binh Tho Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC

name: Vincom Plaza Le Van Viet
description: Serves District 9, large facade, includes gym, cinema, and shopping.
address: 50 Le Van Viet, Hiep Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, HCMC

name: Lotte Mart Phu Tho
description: Situated at a major intersection in District 11, popular for family grocery shopping.
address: 968 Ba Thang Hai, Ward 15, District 11, HCMC

name: Saigon Garden
description: Boutique lifestyle mall on Walking Street, filled with greenery and restaurants.
address: 99 Nguyen Hue, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC

name: Cantavil Premier
description: Mixed-use complex in District 2 with a Parkson department store base (reduced).
address: 1 Song Hanh, An Phu Ward, District 2, HCMC

name: RomeA Center
description: Boutique center in District 3, features Bon Grocer and luxury cosmetics.

name: Terra Royal
description: Luxury complex with a small shopping gallery, cinema, and 5-star hotel.
address: 83 Ly Chinh Thang, Ward 8, District 3, HCMC

name: Bloq Thao Dien

address: 19 Tran Ngoc Dien, Thao Dien Ward, District 2, HCMC
